options.Domestic: The account is for a residential property.
options.Occupier: The account holder is an occupier, but may not be the property owner.

options.Fixed: The customer is on a fixed-term contract with a guaranteed price per unit of energy.
options.SVT: The customer is on a Standard Variable Tariff, where the price can fluctuate.
options.Mixed: The customer has a mix of fixed and variable rate products.
options.No Active Agreement: The customer does not have an active energy supply agreement.

options.DF: Dual Fuel - the customer has both gas and electricity with E.ON Next.
options.SE: Single Electricity - the customer only has electricity with E.ON Next.
options.SG: Single Gas - the customer only has gas with E.ON Next.
options.Unknown: The customer's fuel holding is unknown.

options.True: The customer is associated with multiple property IDs.
options.False: The customer is associated with a single property ID.
options.Unknown: It is unknown if the customer is associated with multiple property IDs.

options.True: The customer has multiple instances of the same fuel type.
options.False: The customer does not have multiple instances of the same fuel type.
options.Unknown: It is unknown if the customer has multiple instances of the same fuel type.

options.True: All of the customer's meters are smart meters.
options.False: Not all of the customer's meters are smart meters.
options.Unknown: It is unknown if all of the customer's meters are smart meters.

options.True: All of the customer's meters are classic prepayment meters.
options.False: Not all of the customer's meters are classic prepayment meters.
options.Unknown: It is unknown if all of the customer's meters are classic prepayment meters.

options.no_complaint: The customer has not made a complaint in the last year.
options.had_1_complaint: The customer has made one complaint in the last year.
options.had_more_than_1_complaint: The customer has made more than one complaint in the last year.

options.no_complaint: The customer has not made a complaint in the last two years.
options.had_1_complaint: The customer has made one complaint in the last two years.
options.had_more_than_1_complaint: The customer has made more than one complaint in the last two years.

options.0: No, the customer has not had a complaint that lasted over one month.
options.1: Yes, the customer has had a complaint that lasted over one month.

options.0: The customer does not have any unresolved complaints.
options.1: The customer has at least one unresolved complaint.

options.18_25: The customer's age is estimated to be between 18 and 25.
options.26_35: The customer's age is estimated to be between 26 and 35.
options.36_45: The customer's age is estimated to be between 36 and 45.
options.46_60: The customer's age is estimated to be between 46 and 60.
options.61_75: The customer's age is estimated to be between 61 and 75.
options.76_plus: The customer's age is estimated to be 76 or older.

options.< £30,000: The customer's household income is estimated to be less than £30,000.
options.£30,000 - £69,999: The customer's household income is estimated to be between £30,000 and £69,999.
options.£70,000 - £99,999: The customer's household income is estimated to be between £70,000 and £99,999.
options.> £100,000: The customer's household income is estimated to be greater than £100,000.
options.Unknown: The customer's household income is unknown.

options.Council/Housing Association: The customer rents from a council or housing association.
options.Privately Rented: The customer rents from a private landlord.

options.0_3: The customer has lived at their current address for 0-3 years.
options.4_7: The customer has lived at their current address for 4-7 years.
options.8_10: The customer has lived at their current address for 8-10 years.
options.11_plus: The customer has lived at their current address for 11 or more years.
options.Unknown: The customer's length of residency is unknown.

options.Affluent Families: Represents affluent families, likely with high disposable income.
options.Stable Retirees: Represents retirees with a stable financial situation.
options.Prosperous Midlife: Represents individuals in midlife with a prosperous financial situation.
options.Struggling Elders: Represents elderly individuals who may be financially vulnerable.
options.Emerging Professionals: Represents young professionals at the start of their careers.
options.Resourceful Millennials: Represents millennials who are financially resourceful.
options.Vulnerable Families: Represents families who may be financially vulnerable.
options.Other: A customer persona that does not fit into the other categories.

options.FDD: Fixed Direct Debit - a fixed amount is paid automatically each month.
options.POROB: Payment on Receipt of Bill - the customer pays the bill amount after receiving it.
options.Prepayment: The customer pays for energy in advance using a prepayment meter.
options.VDD: Variable Direct Debit - the amount paid automatically each month varies based on energy usage.

options.True: The customer has a valid email address on file.
options.False: The customer does not have a valid email address on file.

options.True: The customer has a valid landline number on file.
options.False: The customer does not have a valid landline number on file.

options.True: The customer has a valid mobile number on file.
options.False: The customer does not have a valid mobile number on file.

options.0: The customer does not have an agreement ending within a year without renewal.
options.1: The customer has an agreement ending within a year and has not renewed.

options.DIRECT: The customer signed up directly with E.ON Next.
options.ACQUISITION: The customer was acquired through a partnership or acquisition.
options.DIGI_TELESALES: The customer signed up through digital telesales.
options.LANDLORD: The customer was signed up via their landlord.
options.NEW_TENANT: The customer is a new tenant in a property supplied by the company.
options.PRICE_COMPARISON: The customer signed up via a price comparison website.
options.SUPPLIER_OF_LAST_RESORT: The customer was transferred as part of a Supplier of Last Resort event.

options.0: The customer does not have an upcoming agreement.
options.1: The customer has an upcoming agreement.

options.less_than_1y: The customer's last tenure was less than 1 year.
options.1_4: The customer's last tenure was between 1 and 4 years.
options.4_7: The customer's last tenure was between 4 and 7 years.
options.7_11: The customer's last tenure was between 7 and 11 years.
options.11_plus: The customer's last tenure was 11 years or more.
options.Unknown: The customer's last tenure duration is unknown.

options.never: The customer has not accessed their account online in the last 6 months.
options.just_once: The customer has accessed their account online once in the last 6 months.
options.low: The customer has a low frequency of online account access in the last 6 months.
options.mid: The customer has a medium frequency of online account access in the last 6 months.
options.high: The customer has a high frequency of online account access in the last 6 months.

options.never: The customer has not accessed their account online in the last 12 months.
options.just_once: The customer has accessed their account online once in the last 12 months.
options.low: The customer has a low frequency of online account access in the last 12 months.
options.mid: The customer has a medium frequency of online account access in the last 12 months.
options.high: The customer has a high frequency of online account access in the last 12 months.

options.never: The customer has not accessed their account online in the last 24 months.
options.just_once: The customer has accessed their account online once in the last 24 months.
options.low: The customer has a low frequency of online account access in the last 24 months.
options.mid: The customer has a medium frequency of online account access in the last 24 months.
options.high: The customer has a high frequency of online account access in the last 24 months.

options.never: The customer has not used the app in the last 6 months.
options.just_once: The customer has used the app once in the last 6 months.
options.low: The customer has a low frequency of app usage in the last 6 months.
options.mid: The customer has a medium frequency of app usage in the last 6 months.
options.high: The customer has a high frequency of app usage in the last 6 months.

options.never: The customer has not used the app in the last 12 months.
options.just_once: The customer has used the app once in the last 12 months.
options.low: The customer has a low frequency of app usage in the last 12 months.
options.mid: The customer has a medium frequency of app usage in the last 12 months.
options.high: The customer has a high frequency of app usage in the last 12 months.

options.never: The customer has not used the app in the last 24 months.
options.just_once: The customer has used the app once in the last 24 months.
options.low: The customer has a low frequency of app usage in the last 24 months.
options.mid: The customer has a medium frequency of app usage in the last 24 months.
options.high: The customer has a high frequency of app usage in the last 24 months.

options.0: The customer has not churned in the last year.
options.1: The customer has churned in the last year.
